original_title: Peter Kay: The Tour That Didn't Tour Tour
overview: He’s back! One of Britain’s best loved comedians finally brings his record breaking Tour That Doesn’t Tour Tour to DVD. With his first live tour in seven years, playing to over one million people, this hilarious NEW show, sees Peter back on nights, doing what he does best, live stand-up comedy.
tagline: The Biggest Stand-Up Comedy Tour of All Time
title: Peter Kay: The Tour That Didn't Tour Tour
